snippet: The Legislature in North Carolina is at it again, coming up with a new ploy to try to strip Planned Parenthood of financing and hurt all women in the state in the process.
abstract: Editorial deplores vote by North Carolina's Republican-led State Legislature to override Gov Bev Perdue's veto of a flawed budget that strips financing for Planned Parenthood; contends that the move is only the latest example of a conservative assault on the women's health institution.
lead_paragraph: The Legislature in North Carolina is at it again, coming up with a new ploy to try to strip Planned Parenthood of financing and hurt all women in the state in the process.
